DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Veteran-Centered Prostate Cancer Survivorship Care
DOC.detailed_description: Although nearly 150,000 prostate cancer survivor VA , little research understand improve survivorship care large population Veterans . A substantial proportion prostate cancer survivor general population significant side effect treatment ( surgery radiation therapy ) often persist year , include incontinence , erectile dysfunction , metabolic syndrome , contribute decrease quality life . The investigator ' pilot data suggest VA prostate cancer survivor experience similar bad symptom burden general population survivor . To address need improve patient-centered survivorship care management Veterans prostate cancer , investigator propose 4 year study two aim : 1 ) conduct randomize control trial compare personally tailor automated telephone symptom management intervention improve symptom symptom self-management usual care . The investigator expect intervention group confidence symptom self-management good symptom self-management prostate cancer quality life follow intervention , outcomes translate efficient use service Veterans , 2 ) compare utilization service among intervention group control group .
